title: OceanWNN
authors: Yi Wang, Linsheng Han, Wei Liu, Shujia Yang, Yanbo Gao

parameters.name: train_window_size
parameters.description: Window size used for forecasting the next point

parameters.name: hidden_size
parameters.description: Number of neurons in hidden layer

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.description: Number of instances trained at the same time

parameters.name: test_batch_size
parameters.description: Batch size over test and validation dataset

parameters.name: epochs
parameters.description: Number of training iterations over entire dataset; recommended value: 1000

parameters.name: early_stopping_delta
parameters.description: If 1 - (loss / last_loss) is less than `delta` for `patience` epochs, stop

parameters.name: early_stopping_patience
parameters.description: If 1 - (loss / last_loss) is less than `delta` for `patience` epochs, stop

parameters.name: threshold_percentile
parameters.description: Upper percentile of training residual distribution used for detection replacement.

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator

parameters.name: with_threshold
parameters.description: If true, values whose forecasting error exceeds the threshold are not included in next window, but are replaced by the prediction.
